page.title: 12FILTER STATION, HELMSHORE.
page.content:
The filter station is a building that cleans water from the second main reservoir.Workers put it in a big tank and then they put chemicals in the water. Next it goes to the people's homes.
The filter station has big tanks round the back and some at the front as well. They let some water in to the first reservoir and all the debris goes into the sludge tanks.
They have a pump house to pump water around to homes. If the top reservoir overflows, there are bywashes at the side of the reservoir. They let the water into the first reservoir and then it goes to a cotton mill.
